column3: News;Siem Reap:------ According to the National Police Commissioner
column6: a suspect device was reported to the police.------A supposed bomb had been left in front of Chea Chek Chum
column7: in front of the Royal Palace in Siem Reap at about 9am.------After the news
column10: the device was simply an MP3 speaker that had broken and been dumped.
